blog.name: astrumsilex-draco
blog.title: SUBJECTIVE
blog.description: Here Queer (AF) and filled with Existential feeear/depression. I blog LGBT things and will take asks for anything you want to know about LGBT for your self issues or if you just want some knowledge. I blog mainly about fandom stuff, my thoughts, headcanons, short stories, gifs ect for sherlock, harry potter, supernatural, merlin, jse ect. feel free to explore my dark corner of the internet. you can ask me anything don't be shy we are all one unit here.

tags: hardest thing is the best thing
summary: OH MY GOD JUST THOUGHT OF THE SADEST DRARRY PROMPT.
body:
OH MY GOD JUST THOUGHT OF THE SADEST DRARRY PROMPT.

Right so I’m listening to the song “reality without you (acoustic)” by “our last night"I was just minding my own business on Tumblr when my thoughts where raveged by this drarry prompt.

Right so Harry and draco are together but they are super insecure in themselves and they find it hard to trust eachother but eventually they do and they are in a really good place for a few months but then something really horrible happened like some big ass dirtbag wizard is power hungry and is trying to take over what’s left of Malfoy fortune and take over power of Hogwarts and has a massive empire right and draco gets caught up in it all trying to fight off the guy and whatnot but the wizard is too powerful and manipulates draco into compliance by threatening him with Harry. Due to this draco pushes Harry away hurting him so much Harry leaves to go back to the muggle world but draco doesn’t anticipate how hurt Harry really is cause Harry has been harbouring so much feelings from years of his life where he couldn’t express then draco came along made it all better then riped it away making Harry spiral into depression. Draco has no clue he know he hurt him just not to that extent now draco is used to dealing with powerful assholes (his dad voldemort umbridge) right so he knows how to manuver so he can take down the wizard at one point he runs into Harry in the wizard world and he is completely a wreck draco takes care of him they have a massive fight and draco ends up spilling all of his feelings and thought and everything about the wizard to Harry and they stubbornly continue to fight but then they make up and Harry helps draco cause he is the bit who lived and he can’t die cause he is Harry fucking potter and draco is his boyfriend and nothing can stop him from helping him and stuff so they end up defeating the wizard but then it’s like the beginning all over again neither of them have confidence and find it hard to trust eachother Harry toward draco more so but slowly they learn to trust eachother again and happy soppy fluffy ending. Also stuff with harmoiney Ron and Harry best friends stuff and fluff with harmoiney and Ron and then all three of them with draco fights and acceptance and family love fluff of the four like yup.

tags: harry potter and the chamber of secrets
summary: Can we please talk about how DRACO MALFOY in Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets went to look for Crabbe and Goyle when they...
body:
Can we please talk about how DRACO MALFOY in Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets went to look for Crabbe and Goyle when they didn’t come back after the fest? When Harry and Ron had drunken polyjiuce potion, knocked them out and were wandering the dungeons pretty lost and Draco was relieved to finally having found them? 

How Slytherin of him is this, huh? Give him a little love for being so caring about his big, dumb friends.

Of course he mocks them the second he found them but I believe this is because Percy was present as well and you know how bad JK’s writing can sometimes be.

summary: He’s constantly caffeinated, never knows what time it is, and crushing hard on his boss. Working in the Department of Mysteries...
caption:
He’s constantly caffeinated, never knows what time it is, and crushing hard on his boss.
Working in the Department of Mysteries is everything he thought it would be.

Tom Holland as a space loving assistant to a closeted Pureblood Ben Barnes.  Shenanigans ensue.

Check him out here!

summary: The Potter Twins and the Philosopher's Stone
title: The Potter Twins and the Philosopher's Stone
body:
On that fateful Halloween night when James and Lily Potter are murdered, their infant twins, Harry and Aralynn, are sent to live in separate homes—Aralynn with a magical family, and Harry with an ordinary one. However, when they’re both accepted to Hogwarts, and things start to get spooky.

Rumination

Exams had finally come to plague Hogwarts. Since the incident in the Dark Forest, Aralynn had been avoiding Harry at all costs. The last thing she wanted was the possibility of being confronted, but…

Read more…

tags: the fact that she likes to read and doesn't mask when she is upset is so important guys
thanks if you actually read everything
summary:
Hermione isn't a badass because she punched Draco or set birds on Ron.
Hermione is a badass because :
- she loves to learn, read...
body:
Hermione isn’t a badass because she punched Draco or set birds on Ron.

Hermione is a badass because :

- she loves to learn, read and she doesn’t mask her love for school

- she didn’t change when people constantly called her a know-it-all (nothing wrong with participating in class honestly guys)

- she lied for Ron and Harry after they saved her from the troll even when she knew she would be in trouble

- she was proud to be a muggleborn

- she stood up for house elfs when nobody cared for them

- she help organised an illegal resistance club

- she took her prefect duties very seriously and was honoured to be a prefect

- after being torture, she took on bellatrix appearance because she knew how important this was to end the war

- she could have go into hiding but decided to help Harry and face even more danger

- she destroyed an horcruxe

There is probably more reasons that I didn’t list here. Being violent or even cruel like Hermione can be sometimes (rita skeeter, im thinking bout you) isn’t what being badass is.

Please don’t praise violence, Hermione Granger is so much more than that.

(Ps : sorry for any spelling mistakes etc)

summary: Okay. But... why? Do we even know how to do that? Oh god, I really hope not. Great. No one goes in that corridor. That’s super...
body:
Okay. But… why? Do we even know how to do that?

Oh god, I really hope not.

Great. No one goes in that corridor. That’s super cryptic and creepy.

Who else could be getting these instructions? It’s weird and creepy. Maybe Ben received them on accident or something.

Well, the game has already made the choice for me so…

I need my friendship levels higher with the squad. Especially Penny… thank you update!!

Alright. Let’s go check it o–!

We interrupt the plot for a side quest.

Slytherins haven’t done anything to us. I don’t get it.

Okay this is Chester’s plan. I believe that 100%. Especially after last year. I HAVEN’T FORGOTTEN HOW YOU MADE ME FIGHT MY FRIENDS. I get what it was all for BUT STILL.

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

summary:
WICꞰED: adult based wizarding world

 With the wizarding world entering the “modern age” came the inevitable tension between...
caption:
WICꞰED: adult based wizarding world

With the wizarding world entering the “modern age” came the inevitable tension between pureblood conservatives and those embracing the change. The Ministry has become a zoo of radical ideas on how the wizarding world should be. 

People looking to blame someone for the new modern age monstrosity are starting to point fingers – most of them towards muggleborns.

WIKI + PLOT + RULES + CANONS + FACES + WANTED

summary: Moment voted on at my Patreon! :) You want to choose what I draw? Get a sketch request? BECOME A PATRON! :D (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:・ﾟ✧  ஐﻬ MY...
caption:
Moment voted on at my Patreon! :) You want to choose what I draw? Get a sketch request? BECOME A PATRON! :D

(ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:・ﾟ✧  ஐﻬ MY PATREON ﻬஐ

Harry looked over at Hermione and the question he had been about to ask died in his throat. Hermione was watching Ron fret over the fate of the Cattermoles, and there was such tenderness in her expression that Harry felt almost as if he had surprised her in the act of kissing him.

-Deathly Hallows

I LOVE RON SO MUCH- like, there they are, in the woods- everything is suddenly f$%^ed. He’s bled so much he fainted and is grievously injured, has that damned locket starting to effect him, they don’t know what to do next- AND HE’S THINKING OF THE CATTERMOLES! D:  

THIS IS WHY HERMIONE IS EYEING HIM UP. I mean… This is why she LOVES him. Like, she and Harry don’t think like that. They are so driven with purpose that it’s easy for them to forget the little guy. RON NEVER FORGETS THE LITTLE GUY!

BONUS: Harry being cool as hell about this:

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application
